item.title: [RBX-GRA-SBG][Collaborative solutions] - Hosted Exchange
item.description:
Jul 29, 13:26 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 25/07/2022 11:30 UTC
End Time : 28/07/2022 22:24 UTC
Service impact : Mailbox access from Outlook to ex3.mail.ovh.net was not functioning properly
Current status : Resolved

Jul 28, 22:35 UTC
Update - Operations on the following maintenance [RBX-GRA-SBG][Exchange] - Upgrade infrastructure have been successfully done.
We keep this incident under monitoring until tomorrow morning.

Jul 28, 14:40 UTC
Update - In order to further improve the performance of our exchange service.
Our technical teams will carry out a maintenance operation on the infrastructure
You can follow the operation here => [RBX-GRA-SBG][Exchange] - Upgrade infrastructure

Jul 27, 13:04 UTC
Monitoring - Exchange services is now stable. We are continuing our operations to improve the performance of services.

Jul 26, 22:10 UTC
Update - We have increased capacity to minimise the impact on Microsoft Exchange services.
Our goal is to minimize the impact on your services.
We are continuing our investigations with Microsoft
Guide link: Guide link

Jul 26, 16:19 UTC
Update - Mailbox access from Outlook to ex3.mail.ovh.net is not functioning properly, while webmail is working correctly.
Due to a huge number of connections, every 6 hours all front-end servers exceed the number of tcp connections which is usually absorbed.
This is degrading the synchronization of the service which performance may be affected. Â 
OVHcloud took the lead to alert @ Microsoft about this and opened a dedicated ticket.
While the root cause is still being investigated, we implement actions to avoid this challenge of excess of tcp connections. Therefore we are adding more servers to manage the this unexpected load and maintain good quality from a user perspective.
The teams are fully mobilized on the delivery of these servers to preserve users experience.

Guide link: Guide link

Jul 26, 14:45 UTC
Update - Update : As a reminder, you can access your mail via webmail, please find below the user guide and webmail connection:
Guide link: Guide link
Investigations by our teams are still in progress to restore the service.

Jul 26, 12:09 UTC
Investigating - Ongoing actions : We notice that the problem still persist. So, our technical teams are investigating the issue.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Jul 25, 15:02 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 25/07/2022 11:30 UTC
Service status: The situation is stabilized, the connection to the email account via outlook is functional again.
Ongoing actions : Our technicians are currently monitoring the situation.

Jul 25, 14:35 UTC
Update - A frontend update has been made but the root cause is still being analyzed.

Jul 25, 12:54 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 25/07/2022 11:30 UTC
Service impact : Mailbox access from Outlook to ex3.mail.ovh.net is not function properly, webmail is working correctly.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently investigating the origin of this incident for a quick fix.

item.title: [France][Internet Access] - FTTH
item.description:
Jul 22, 14:43 UTC
Resolved - The incident has been resolved.
If you still have a problem, please restart your modem to restore your access. If the behavior persists, please contact our support.
We are sorry for the inconvenience.

Jul 22, 14:01 UTC
Update - An intervention is in progress on the equipment of our collection operator.
We invite you to restart your modem to restore access to your services.

Jul 22, 08:03 UTC
Update - The Fiber provider is currently working on its Infrastructure to solve the problem.
However, some initially affected accesses are now available.

The root cause has not yet been identified.

Jul 21, 10:41 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 21/07/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Service interruption on some access might be observed
Ongoing actions : Interventions are in progress in order to correct in a perennial way as fast as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
